1.  11/30/2022 Data

```{r}

library(haven)
adae <- read_sas("https://github.com/elong0527/r4csr/raw/master/data-adam/adae.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)

adae
```

2.  Viz

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(adae) +
  aes(x = AESEV, y = AGE, fill = SEX) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal()

```

2.  Int Viz

```{r}
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)

dv1 <- ggplot(adae) +
  aes(x = AESEV, y = AGE, fill = SEX) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(dv1)
```
